for the first time in july 2000 hizb announced a unilateral cease fire after which dialogue took place between indian government and commanders ceasefire talks were held of had india hizbulmujahideen declared one sided commandos talk on 12 that there was hind(india) called dialogs opposition party year with initiated peace hizbulla hindi (indian) hizbul onesided during
